comment: Dr. Pruden is an amazing professor. There are plenty of extra credit opportunities during class as long as you participate in class. Show up, read the textbook before class discussions, and do the quizzes and homework on time and this class will be a cake walk.

She is one of the kindest and caring professors I've had at KSU. Please contact her if you ever need help with anything in the class. She will respond and genuinely cares about her students' success. She offers extra credit opportunities and grades fairly. Just remember to do the work, and you'll get an A in the class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: Definitely would take her again. She is very caring and willing to work with you. Just stay on top of reading, online lectures and paying attention in class and you should be good.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures

comment: I had her last semester and she was amazing. Attendance was mandatory but going to class rlly helps your grade. There was a lot of homework but she was very helpful with explaining everything and responds to emails quickly!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Accessible outside class

comment: I liked her , but some things were just sooo confusing in this class . She's great at explaining though , and willing to help you . You have discussion post , and quizzes due every week , and also a final project which was so difficult . but overall she is far from terrible . I just wasn't a big fan of the topics we would discuss , boring .
rating_tags: Tough grader--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Loved Prof. Pruden's class. She is very easy to reach outside of class & answers quickly. Drops a ton of grades at the end of the year + gives extra credit. Lectures were fun + actually interesting. She is very fun and engaging and gives great feedback. Quiz + discussion every week, some more difficult than others. Def take this class!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: actual hw is a different visual design project each week but they're not too difficult; textbook chapters are very long and she'll also link a bunch of videos as part of the homework as well. but she's super nice and very engaging in her lectures. responds quickly to emails and is always ready to help in or outside of class
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Professor Pruden is a great teacher. She is obviously very knowledgable about this class and makes it very fun to be apart of. You have discussions every week and either a quiz or a rumination (essay). Shes very flexible and makes assignments fun. Also a very philosophical class.
